item.title: Fixing the KBD Drop claws announce (NEW ERROR, NOT REPOST)
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

when the code is like this:
}
if(npcs[i].npcType == 50 && NpcDrops == 8002) {
temp.yell(“Some one killed the kbd and got claws!”);
}

i get this error:
NPCHandler.java:2928: incomparable types: NPCDrops [] and int
if (npcs [i].npcType == 50 && NpcDrops == 8002) {
--------------------------------------------------^
(the — is just space for the arrow to point wer the error is)

THEN: if i change it to

}
if(npcs[i].npcType == 50 && npcdrop == 8002) {
temp.yell(“Some one killed the kbd and got claws!”);
}

i get the error i cannot find symbol aka npcdrop doesnt exist!

what do i do?

Read full topic
